quote.text: You have power over your mind not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quote.author: Marcus Aurelius

scripture.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️

Hi ms sunshine Today I just want to speak peace over your heart. Life can feel overwhelming sometimes, but remember you're never walking alone. You carry light even on your hard days — and I see that. I hope today reminded you of your strength, your softness, and your deep purpose. Keep leaning into prayer, into grace, and into joy. I believe in you, and I pray that tonight your soul rests in stillness and comfort. Always cheering for you, always proud of you 💙💙
